CutSceneText.Text: Ecus knew that there was a traitor within the Legion.
But Icaronix caught wind of it
and quickly lured the Legion out to Karamatis.
So my Legion has already set out for Karamatis?
Yes, right after receiving Icaronix's report.
No! I'm too late--Icaronix has betrayed us!
Get word to the Captain that this is a trap!
That was the last I saw of Ecus.
I've thought of him often...I wonder what happened to him.
